firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to be user-centric and secure. All user-specific data, including their documents and chat messages, are stored in subcollections under their unique user ID. This path-based ownership model allows for simple and effective security rules, ensuring users can only access their own data. The `ChatMessage` entity is nested under a `Document` to keep conversations tied to their specific context.
